Uses of Package
alix.lucene

  • Packages that use alix.lucene 
    Package Description
    alix.lucene
    Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
    alix.lucene.search
    Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
  • Classes in alix.lucene used by alix.lucene 
    Class Description
    Alix
    An Alix object is a wrapper around a Lucene index with lexical tools, to be shared across a complex application (ex: web servlet).
    Alix.FSDirectoryType  
    DocType
    Alix types of documents.
    SrcFormat  
  • Classes in alix.lucene used by alix.lucene.search 
    Class Description
    Alix
    An Alix object is a wrapper around a Lucene index with lexical tools, to be shared across a complex application (ex: web servlet).
